channel.title: Kink on Ariel DeWinter
channel.description: Recent content in Kink on Ariel DeWinter

item.title: Consensual Banging: Tips for Bringing Kink to the Page
item.description: Sex and sexuality has always been a part of storytelling, whether it’s via spoken word or on the page. Sexuality and sexual interest, like many aspects of the human experience, are not straight lines. As an author, bringing your characters to life is your job, but there are a lot of things with sex and kink (and kinky sex) that people just don’t think about sometimes when they’re writing. Let’s see what we can do to spice up your spice!
